text: void main ( ) { int t , n , i = 0 , j , max , sum = 0 ; long long int a [ 100000 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; i = 0 ; while ( i < n ) { j = i ; max = a [ i ] ; while ( a [ j ] >= max ) { max = a [ j ] ; j ++ ; } sum += ( ( j - i ) * ( j - i - 1 ) ) / 2 ; i = j ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum + n ) ; sum = 0 ; } }
